English: Oh, those clothes... You must be Ryuji's new hire.
Chinese:
哦，你那衣服……
難道，你就是龍司那的新人嗎？
Korean:
아, 그 옷은……
혹시 네가 류지네 신입이냐?
German:
Hm, diese Klamotten ... Du bist wohl Ryujis
Neuling.

English:
Me? The name's Gorou Matayoshi. You could say I'm
an "acquaintance" of Ryuji and Chitose.
Chinese:
我啊？我是龍司跟千歲的熟人，
叫做又吉五郎。
Korean:
나 말이냐? 뭐어 난 류지나 치토세와 아는 사이인데
마타요시 고로라고 하지
German:
Ich? Ich bin Gorou Matayoshi. Man könnte sagen,
dass ich ein Bekannter von Ryuji und
Chitose bin.

English:
I was in the area so I stopped by to see how
they're doing. Guess they're both out now?
Chinese:
我剛好到這附近來，所以來看看他們好不好。
他們不在嗎？
Korean:
근처에 들를 일이 있어서 녀석들 상태를 보러 왔다.
두 사람은 지금 없나?
German:
Ich war gerade in der Gegend, also dachte ich,
ich schaue mal vorbei. Sind sie gerade unterwegs?

English: I see. Them's the breaks, I guess.
German: Verstehe. Da hatte ich wohl Pech.

English:
I also came to say hi to little Erika...but I
didn't bring her anything, so I'll just come back.
Chinese:
雖然想跟艾莉卡打聲招呼……
但今天沒帶伴手禮，只好下次再說了。
Korean:
에리카와도 인사를 해두고 싶지만……
오늘은 선물도 없으니 다음에 다시 오지
German:
Außerdem wollte ich die kleine Erika besuchen ...
aber ich habe ihr nichts mitgebracht. Ich komme
ein anderes Mal wieder.

English: Tell Ryuji that Matayoshi stopped by, will ya?
Chinese: 幫我跟龍司說，又吉有來找他喔。
German: Sag Ryuji, dass Matayoshi hier war, ja?

English:
...Say, don't you get up to any funny business,
kid. One wrong move...and I'll bust you, see?
Chinese:
……你也別去做壞事喔。
要是做了什麼的話……我可會逮捕你們。
Korean:
……너도 나쁜 짓 같은 건 하지 마라.
뭔가 저지를 것 같으면 그땐……체포해버릴 테니까
German:
... Hey, verzapf bloß keine Dummheiten, ja?
Eine falsche Bewegung und du bist dran, okay?

English:
Just jerking your chain! I sounded like Date for a
second there, ha ha ha!
Chinese: 開玩笑的啦！ 我只是想說說看而已，哈哈哈！
Korean: 농담이야! 다테 같은 소리를 해버렸군. 핫핫핫!
German:
Ich ziehe dich bloß auf! Ich klang fast wie
Date, hahaha!

English:
(Was he a detective or something? I wonder how he
knows Ryuji and the others?)
Chinese:
（他是……刑警嗎？
　到底跟龍司他們，是什麼樣的關係啊……？）
German:
(War das ein Kommissar? Ich frage mich, wie er
Ryuji und die anderen kennt?)
